…Century Farm Designation of Black's Willow Run Farm

Mr. JOYCE of Pennsylvania. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to honor four  generations of the Black family in Tyrone Township, Blair County,  Pennsylvania, on the designation of their farm as a Century Farm by the  Pennsylvania Department of Agriculture.
